package.name: ND_EasyConfig
package.summary: Easiest way to access System -> Configuration menu
package.description:
This extension is useful to make easy access of System -> Configuration menu.
It will add sub-menu of all config sections in System menu on hover of configuration link.
You can still open configuration link or also can direct reach to particular section of configuration.
 

Features

  • Easy to integrate with default admin menu
  • Display all sub-menu items of system -> configuration section
  • Easy to reach any configuration setting by one click
  • 100% open source
package.notes: Easiest way to access System -> Configuration menu
